website_summaries.verdict: Flexible and sturdy, this adjustable bag can hold a wide variety of drone types up to a Phantom 4-sized quad.
pros: Fits many different configurations of DJI Phantom drones, including accessories, a full-size DSLR with lens, and more
cons: Some buyers claim that this option arrives used

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fits the DJI Phantom 4, plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack for your DJI Phantom. After extensively researching several different options I chose the Manfrotto for my Phantom 4. I like that the backpack doesn't scream "DRONE" with its look. People are genuinely surprised when you pull out a complete flight setup. The P4 batteries are too wide to fit in the front battery compartments, but the zippered containers in the center area hold them without issue. I mainly use this for hiking into remote areas, and it's far more comfortable than other backpacks I've tried in the past. It seems well made, and likely to hold up for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JJFxR

customer_reviews.title: Great drone Backpack. Compatible with the X-Star Premium Drone.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. A little larger than I was expecting, but very nice quality and construction. Fits my X-Star Premium drone upright in the quick release section with props attached and upside down with the props off for complete enclosure inside the bag. Plenty of room for extra batteries and anything else you'd need to bring along. The only con so far is the lack of mesh pockets on the sides for water bottles. Thinking about using my dog's water pouches from his backpack for the very tight side pockets on this backpack. Update: If bringing water along with you is important, a bike water bottle will squeeze in the zippered sides.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Received 2nd hand or refurbished bag??
customer_reviews.text: This is a difficult review. I love the bag and all it does... However the bag I received was dirty on the inside & had 'usage' marks. While this doesn't effect the performance of the product itself - I just can't help feel taken advantage of in that I appear to have been sent a refurbished or even a returned product - but at FULL PRICE!! :( I tried to use the dirty tag on the inside of the bag to register and it wouldn't let me either!! p.s. I love Manfrotto products and will never stop buying them but I think they need to be aware that there may be some "sharp practices" taking place here!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for something more than the drone
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought it thinking on to carry something more than my P3S, as most of you know; by prior reviews and Youtube videos; the bag offers excellent room for the P3S and accessories, the drone fits snug and something tight, but I prefer a drone tight instead an "dancing" drone, my major concern were the top compartment, because I wanted to carry my DSRL (Nikon D7100) with grip and his lens (Sigma 17-50), and yes; it fits very well, even is possible to fit the SB700 and the GoPro 4 sessions. In the pics you can see the relative size against a Lowepro Transit 250, and a Manfrotto 190CX; not the lightest to carry, but the only I have.
customer_reviews.author: César de la Garza

customer_reviews.title: The product is great, excellent over all
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, excellent over all...everything inside is compartmentalized so it my life easier to travel on plane. TSA knew what was inside and didn't bother to inspect my drone. Only because this bag made everything easy to see. Highly recommend. Only reason why I remove 2 stars is although I verified this product to be real....the bar code was hard to read and register due to someone blacking it out with a sharpie, and making me waste time researching it's authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Germo

customer_reviews.title: the quality was excellent so decided to get home and do some more ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried a bunch of packs at a local store but none were designed specifically for drones they were all for cameras, and while I was trying them found one from Manfrotto brand, the quality was excellent so decided to get home and do some more research, managed to locate this bag designed for drones and order it, the package was well protected and the shipping came rift on time, couldn't ask for better handling. If you are looking for a bag to fit your phantom 4 and don't want a hard case I believe this is the one to get, the price is great and so is the quality
customer_reviews.author: HZ

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, solid, and fits in the overhead compartment.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an awesome beast. Fits in the overhead compartment on any airplane. Here's what I've got packed in mine: [x] DJI Phantom 3 4k [x] 2 Phantom batteries [x] Drone charger [x] Drone propellers (8) [x] EF 50mm f/1.4 [x] EF 85mm f/1.8 [x] SD card case (holds 12 cards) [x] Canon 5D body [x] EF 24-70mm f/2.8 [x] Lens Filters [x] infrared remote [x] LCD viewfinder [x] 2 spare 5D batteries & charger [x] 4 spare 60D batteries & charger [x] MacBook Air [x] iPad mini Quality is first-rate, as I've come to expect from the Manfrotto brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Capacity and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal versatility in true Manfrotto style. It pairs perfectly with my DJI Phantom 4 Pro Obsidian, but I do recommend motor caps for added protection (you can never be too careful). Definitely recommend pairing your Full Frame Mirrorless (I have a Sony A7Rii) and your Phantom of choice! (...and a Manfrotto Befree Tripod!)
customer_reviews.author: Kai S.

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is awesome. It can fit my P4P
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome. It can fit my P4P, and all it's accessories like props, transmitter, iPad mini, cables, etc, my Canon 5d mk iii and a 2 averaged sized lenses, and my Macbook pro. Plus the way you can attach the drone to the back with the props still attached for quick access really comes in handy. The only reason for the 4 star review is the build quality is not the best. It's not bad, it's just not the best, the zippers and clips could be better. I highly recommend it this product if you hike of cary want to cary lots of gear in one package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My P4P Obsidian fits perfectly in here! Also not sure what people mean about the P4P batteries not fitting, mine fit the battery holders just fine. Unless there was a design change in the newest batch of these I'm not sure what the issue was. Definitely one of the best backpacks out there for the P4P! Fits my P4P with battery, 2 batteries (You could put at least 2 more in the red pouches that surround the aircraft) as well as ALL the accessories you could want, and my iPad mini with Otterbox Case on it with room to spare. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lester Tsai Photography

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot of stuff inside of it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality material, the bag is durable and protects your camera equipment from a drop & heavy weather conditions. I store my cannon 5D mark Iv, dji drone and a couple of other equipments and it fits perfect. Easy to carry thanks to all the straps around it. It feels safe and secure when it’s on ur back
customer_reviews.author: Erick S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality pack for carrying the phantom 4.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband, who owns the Phantom 4. I was not sure if that drone would fit in the pack, so I was a little worried about ordering it without his approval (gift), but he says it does fit nicely. It also has room for extra batteries, etc. This protects his equipment better than the pack he was using before, and it is lighter for him to carry. He also reports that it is of high quality construction with quality zippers and other hardware. He has had absolutely no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Would be lost without this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic backpack. I fit my DJI Phantom 4 with ease, along with the controller, DJI charger, propellers + spare, Canon Rebel T5i, Rode Mic, GoPro Hero 4, GoPro mounts and water floats and 2 large portable battery backup chargers. I was also able to take this backpack on as carry on, went thru multiple security checkpoints with no issues as at all, and fit within the overhead cabin compartments with no problem. Highly recommend this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: William Singvongsa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father in law, since he vacations a lot and likes to bring his drone. Really high quality material, and versatile - he’s able to fit the drone and a ton of other stuff in the bag comfortably and securely. He tells us every time he uses it how much he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Virocman

customer_reviews.title: It will fit a phantom 4
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and some people said that they didn't get the actual bag it was a rip off or knock off I have to say this is an original. And for whoever said a phantom 4 does not fit what's pictured is a phantom for it fits perfect the batteries fit in the battery compartment as well. this is a very nice bag. I would totally recommend it and I would recommend getting motor caps for your Phantom.
customer_reviews.author: AstridsMommy

customer_reviews.title: The Ferrari of drone backpacks
customer_reviews.text: This pack is even better than I expected. Very roomy while also being compact. It fits a Phantom with or without props, 3 or more batteries, accessories, a large tablet, a thin laptop and a DSLR w/ an extra lens. I bought this to replace my DJI hardshell backpack mainly for the feature that allows for carrying the drone w/ props on, as well as being able to pack a DSLR. The pack is exceedingly comfortable, with very well-cushioned straps and it feels very well-balanced. I couldn't be happier. You know you're getting quality w/ Manfrotto and that's reflected here in the design and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is great! My phantom 4 pro fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great! My phantom 4 pro fits nicely. I can carry my Mackbook Pro, iPad 4 mini, Dslr camera and everything I need for my drone. I loaded it up just to see how comfortable it was. It was heavy but still comfortable to carry. The straps a padded nicely with plenty of adjustments. I didn’t think the price was bad for such a nice bag. I felt everything in it was protected. Another great product from Manfrotto.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag with plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing bag. I purchased this to carry my drone, 3 extra batteries, the remote, 6 pack set of lense covers, chargers and cables, DJI goggles, GoPro 4, batteries, charger and lense filters, Canon Rebel Camera and an extra lense and a couple Goal Zero solar chargers . It was snug due to the odd shape of the VR goggles however it still fit. Bag is very comfortable even loaded up. I wore it on hikes, brought it to the beaches and every other adventure from the Oceans of Maui to the snow covered mountains of Vermont.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Pro Tips!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a drone. Actually a good bag for anything. I've had it for a 6 months now so I can officially offer some pro tips: You'll want to get motor caps for the drone. It's all Velcro so don't be afraid to customize it, I took out a couple pouches for less bulk and it's helped a lot. Use the straps when hiking they help even the weight and make the journey way more enjoyable ;) hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Misda

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME bag to carry DJI Phantom. Bought it to help carry on my Phantom3 when flying commercially. Fits easily in standard overhead compartments. Snug fit, requiring a slight bit of compression when flying on regional jets, like the Canadian CRJ700 which has MUCH smaller overhead space. Allows my D800 with 24-120 to travel in the top section. When on the ground and moving from location to location, the ability to leave the props attached for quick deployment is a great time saver. My favorite photo bag.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Frocchi

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, it is perfect for a vlogger or a photographer that likes to take video as well. DJI phantom 3 fits perfect and you have the option to keep the blades on. Love the bag around. I recommend this bag if you haven't upgraded drones to the phantom 4. If you did upgrade I think they have one for it, but if not you can modify the battery slots to fit one extra phantom 4 battery and keep one in the drone. so that way you still fit two batteries.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my XSTAR and love how everything fits: drone, extra props, four batteries, controller, charger, ND filters, VR goggles, and even still room for a bottle of water on the side. A little pricey, but I have other Manfrotto equipment and have been satisfied thus far with build quality and fit and finish. This is a great bag for any drone of this form factor.
customer_reviews.author: RevJVegas

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bag for the phantom 4 pro.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is a must if you’re traveling with a phantom 4 pro and I assume it will still work someday when the phantom 5 comes out too. I’m truly amazed they can fit in this fairly big drone and plus my SLR, laptop, lenses etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bearfilm1

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for a traveler
customer_reviews.text: A great travel companion. I like to travel with my drone and my dslr and being that I can carry both and my laptop in one bag is a pleasure. I recently went to mexico with a different bag for my drone and dslr and it SUCKED. I wish I had this on my trip. I would have taken my drone on more hikes and experiences...
customer_reviews.author: sailorcolin

customer_reviews.title: FITS EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Was able to fit our DSLR on top, 13" macbook pro and ipad on the side, phantom 4 pro, 2 extra dslr lenses, chargers, and all drone accessories in the bag. Fit under the seat for most domestic and international flights in Australia. Sturdy and comfortable while hiking. Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Toman

customer_reviews.title: BEST backpack for your DRONE and MORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This drone bag is AWESOME!!! I am able to put all of my drone gear in it plus have room for most of my GoPro stuff. The quality of this bag is the best I have ever seen. very well padded. plenty of room for a macbook pro and a full size Ipad. Note the Ipad Pro will not fit in the tablet pocket but will work in the area with your computer
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design for Tablets.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack but there is a design error that could crack tablet screens as it did to my iPad mini. Pressure from the drone motors push against the section where laptops and tablets can be carried. Be careful as I had my tablet in a protective case. I very much love this backpack for my drone but I will never carry a laptop or tablet in it again.
customer_reviews.author: FalloutHero

customer_reviews.title: Dont think about it, just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been through a few cheap/ebay drone backpacks. But each one was lacking in some way.. I decided to go with this one, after seeing many positive reviews. Yes its a bit more expensive, but it is worth every penny.. It holds tons of stuff. Can be used with different types of drones.. Or you can use it as a regular backpack..
customer_reviews.author: Xpro2shooter

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Pricey backpack no doubt. But my phantom fits perfectly! I also fit a 200mm and 55mm spare DSLR lens, and my DSLR camera (in top pocket). The pack is heavy when loaded down, but all the added support straps make it manageable. I highly recommend this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Beanjapan

customer_reviews.title: Fits Phantom 4  Pro DJI Drone!
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Phantom 4 Pro Drone just fine. You just have to put the battery in one of those larger zipper bags. Very nice bag for what I am using! I was very skeptical at first. I am glad I have this for my drone.
customer_reviews.author: iScubaD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable straps, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Holds my drone, accessories, and I can fit a DSLR in the top compartment, laptop and tablet in the back. Comfortable straps, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MrRifleman

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack i've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack i've ever had, fits my phantom 4 perfectly and a lot of accessories, i've traveled the world with it, still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack.  Buy Motor Caps.
customer_reviews.text: I tried several bags before this one. The looks I'm not thrilled with, but overall, it's Just about perfect for what I need. A little tight for the Phantom 4 Pro at the arm tips. Definitely need to buy motor caps if you want to use this case. Lots of room for accessories. Great build quality. No substantive complaints.
customer_reviews.author: The Feelings Doctor

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bag for our trip to Punta Cana and we loaded it up with gear and it held a DJI Phantom 3 and all of our camera equipment. It can get pretty heavy as a backpack at times but it is still such a great value. You can store your laptop and Ipad and everything you could possibly need for travel photography and videography.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a dslr and phantom 4
customer_reviews.text: This is not a hard case and isn't supposed to be, but I am very impressed with it. It has lots of room and is very comfortable. I currently have my phantom 4, 3 batterys, 2 sets of blades, 2 chargers, controller, range extenders, lens wipes, and a controller strap. And I only have filled up 2 of the 3 little red pouches. You could easily put a total of 5 battery in this pack and still have room for a slr in the top compartment. This pack is very high quality and the zippers are working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dronefanatic

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality backpack. Multiple carry options for your drone. Lots of room for other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: John G Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking bag, but for the money I expected it to be made of higher quality material. Also it is a Very tight fit for my P4P. It's quite a hassle to close the main zipper. I bought this mainly for the easy accessibility feather without removing all the propellers.
customer_reviews.author: situ hui

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for storing / carrying my Phantom 4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for storing / carrying my Phantom 4 Pro, a little tight on the arms though. Makes me nervous about bumping the bag into anything or it being stacked with other bags.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Buy this pack!
customer_reviews.text: This pack is PERFECT for me; avid traveler and hiker.. Very well built and comfortable. It fits my DJI P4, batteries (3), remote, charger, range extenders, filters (everything I need) perfectly. I use the top portion for my standard camera and camera gear. I took it to Bali as a carry-on and it fit perfectly in the over-head compartment. The rain cover was perfect for Bali. The flat compartment, in the back, is perfect for my books and iPad. I HIGHLY recommend this pack!
customer_reviews.author: zonin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. lots of space, very well thought design. Not too heavy. no concerns. excellent build quality with Manfrotto. Pay once, cry once, but exellent quality. Cannot recommend enough. Buy this with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Rhona W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for your DJI quadcopter! Well padded and organized. Worked exceptionally well going through airports!
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great, It fits my phantom 3 and all my ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great, It fits my phantom 3 and all my accessories snuggly. It is a pretty big bag but not oversized, it holds my 3 batteries, drone, and controller, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: eric storey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I used to travel with 2 backpacks, 1 for my phantom 4 and 1 for my dslr camera. and now, I've came across this.. Finally!! A backpack that can carry a drone/dslr camera when needed. Makes it alot easier without having to ask a friend to give me a hand. Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit.My Phantom 4 Pro fits nicely and all the ancillary equipment as well plus having enough room for laptop and all my personal stuff.Very nicely made and good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality bag. Used for international travel and fits Phantom 4 Pro and P4P batteries no problem. Was able to easily pack go pros, go pro accessories, laptop, 3 spare batteries, , cannon with lens, all charging cables etc. Very sturdy bag that provides good drone protection. Also fits easily in the overhead bins on planes without problems.
customer_reviews.author: ma214

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bag ever
customer_reviews.text: After doing a ton of research. I am so glad with this purchase. ITs Best travel bag ever. Super quality and every space is well thought out. Fits my Phantom 4 perfectly with 5x batteries, tons of extra gear and my Osmo!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love this Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! It fits all the accessories and the drone perfectly. I also store my regular digital camera and GoPro inside and not bulky. Highly recommended and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: James F Haning

customer_reviews.title: Bag seems nice.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag in the mail and for the most part, it seems great. My only concern is how close the back front motors sit at to the edge where you zip the bag up. Have any of you who have had the bag for a while had issues with motor damage from this. I am thinking maybe I should purchase some motor caps.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for Phantom 4
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag. Holds a Phantom 4 easily, and is more compact than the competing bags on the market I've seen. Very, very well made. And mine at least seems to be a newer version, as the battery pouches hold the Phantom 4 batteries with a bit of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: A real necessity for taking your phantom series drone on a hike.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pack for the DJI phantom drone. Holds everything securely and has plenty of room. Well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Fred L. Dimmick

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Excelent back pack for Drone I loved I used with my phantom 3 pro
customer_reviews.author: Josue Almodovar

customer_reviews.title: Best decison ever, great for Phantom 3
customer_reviews.text: Was searching for a bag for my DJI Phantom 3 Pro and I'm happy I found this one. It can handle at the same time a drone, 3 batteries, props, remote, iPad, laptop, Canon 70D with a lens, chargers for all of them. Feels really durable and is comfortable even with full load of heavy equipment. But I need to remember, it's not a hard case and need to be a little bit careful about not crushing equipment inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent product!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY! Product not as described in pictures or description! There was no pocket for DSLR, no pocket for phantom remote, no hooks for tripod. Absolute ripoff. I’m ordering from official manfrotto website!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out and comfortable. Plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out and comfortable. Plenty of space. In fact, it's better than I expected after using a wonderful Think Tank bag for well over 5 years. Zippers don't seem to be quite as well made/sturdy compared to the Think Tanks but if it lasts it is every bit as good.
customer_reviews.author: Clarkyule

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just recently got this to carry my P4 and accessories. It easily holds all my gear and has room to spare. The design and craftsmanship are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I just bought a drone and this backpack worked great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a drone and this backpack worked great for my needs. I wanted a bag that had room for a drone and a laptop or tablet and this meets my requirements. It's made out of good material and looks like it'll last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy & Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It is a little large, but it gives me a lot more versatility than some of the other bags I have tried. I can store pretty much everything I need in this bag for a nice day trip.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Phantom 4! 5/5
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the DJI Phantom 4 despite what a few other reviewers have said, and I'm glad I did! The Phantom 4 fits perfectly in here after you adjust a few of the internal compartments which is easy since they are velcro. The only thing is the Phantom 4 batteries are too big to fit in the battery compartments of this bag. Which is fine because I ended up storing them on the inside in the main compartment (see attached pictures).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I did take a great look at it
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because I didnt need it, but I did take a great look at it. Wonderful bag. Would buy again if I had the need.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT backpack. Drone fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: GREAT backpack. Drone fits nicely, lots of storage for all your other gear. LOVE that I can fit my DSLR camera, plus lens, plus attachable mic in the upper compartment (its snug, but fits). Super comfortable, and nicely structured frame. Plus it doesn't scream out "I'm a drone pack!" Good job Manfrotto!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much room to fit my camera, lenses, drone and Polaroid camera. Can't wait to take it on my trip to Bali
customer_reviews.author: Kisa m.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag for my DJI Phantom 3 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag for my DJI Phantom 3 Pro. Fits everything I need for a weekend trip out capturing video. Filters, 4 batteries, 8 propellers, charger, remote, plus room for my laptop/iPad! Also this bag was so useful for hikes to solemkey spots for footage. Way better than the DJI bag I originally bought for it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Taino

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable backpack I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: it is so comfortable, this almost feels like it was made for my spine! there is plenty of space and it will fit on an airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Took my Phantom 4 Pro all the way from the northeast U.S. to the Caribbean in this think, then hiked around with it while I was there. Fits everything you'd need drone wise plus a camera and spare lens (depending on the lens).
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Shawley

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra compartments and the fact that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets all of the necessities for my Phantom 3 in with ease. Love the extra compartments and the fact that I can get other things in like my GoPro and iPad.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: I got this backpack for my Phantom 4 and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for my Phantom 4 and it's made it so much easier to transport. I flew to Florida and stowed this in the overhead compartments with everything in it, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack it fits my P4P and MP its made of good quality and really comfortable on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Alnaji

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Holds my P3 standard, controller w/DBA mod, 2 Batts, charger, tablet, extra props and other items too.
customer_reviews.author: Goody

customer_reviews.title: Battery pouches fits the new Dji phantom 4 intelligent batteries. I can store my phantom 4 pro+ ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery pouches fits the new Dji phantom 4 intelligent batteries. I can store my phantom 4 pro+ controller in the top compartment. I can also store a dslr and 1 lens in the middle compartment. Can easily story my 15 in laptop as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... backpack everything you need to be prepared fits feels good and looks
customer_reviews.text: Incredible backpack everything you need to be prepared fits feels good and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Shehulk29

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Phantom 4 (Upside down)
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of questions about this not fitting the P4. I confirm that it fits perfectly, just put the drone in upside down. Great fit, lightweight and lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits my P4P awesome. Goes in upside down and must take the propellors off but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Best DJI Backpack

customer_reviews.title: I little pricey but other than that love the backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack, you can fit in everything but the kitchen zinc :O), my drone feels protected inside this backpack, has a lot of compartments so you can carry your accessories and I dont feel like Im carrying a slab of concrete like with the hard cases. So why only 4 stars, I think the price is a little high, haven't used it very long but it seems like its very good quality so hopefully I'll get what I paid for and it will hold up the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: JTM

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the P4P
customer_reviews.text: So far I have no complaints with this bag. It fits my P4P perfectly and has lots of room for batteries controller, tablet, and my other camera equipment (Sony A7Sii with 2 lenes) and all the chargers I need. Was able to put a NVIDIA Shield K1 and surface 3 in the back no problem. Bought the bag for a trip to Maui next month. Only thing I would recommend is getting motor caps since the bird is upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Nick g

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, allow you to hike without worries. Very clever pockets system, lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Best drone + camera backpack ever. I got it for my phantom 4, carried another battery (could carry 3) plus props, cable! The top pocket I carried gh4 with 12-35 and 100-300 lenses plus rode video mic in one of the drone pocket. I was able to shoot and pack quick with the drone . Great investment , love it

customer_reviews.author: Andrey Smirnov

customer_reviews.title: Super fast. Fantastic bag
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Thursday night, arrived Monday morning, West coast USA to UK. Super fast. Fantastic bag, well worth the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with a drone
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack, this backpack travel to Spain and the Canary Islands
customer_reviews.author: Michael@Elite Travel Service

customer_reviews.title: Great for photographers.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. All the flaws talked about in the reviews seemed to have been fixed for me. I can fit my phantom 4 with 3 batteries, about 12 props, charger, tripod, sony a7rii, extra lens, hammock, and a few other small things all in it comfortably. I put quite a bit of stress on it too. I drop it pretty hard sometimes onto the ground when I'm in a hurry to get a shot. Protects the drone very well. I've taken it through airports and it fits great in overhead compartments even on smaller planes. Would recommend this bag to anyone looking for an awesome drone backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit phantom 4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack however does not fit phantom 4 Pro couldn't even get the remote on and the unit was sticking out
customer_reviews.author: Steve Szymczak

customer_reviews.title: do some hicking and many more and being comfortable all at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Took this back pack for the first time from Canada to guadeloupe with my phantom 4 pro plus and what a deference from carying it in the box it came into. I was able bring it on the plane, do some hicking and many more and being comfortable all at the same time. It’s your looking for some amazing drone footage check out my YouTube Chanel at JADWM&M
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: didnt fit my laptop other then that was a great bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH THE PHANTOM 4
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for the Phantom 3. The quality is there and so are the features. love carrying the drone AND a DSLR. However, opposite to what people answered under the questions section, it does not work well with the Phantom 4. The tips of the motors are a touch longer than the Phantom 3 and they do very slightly get in the way of the zipper. I have to force it in to close. This is something can dealt with though . What cannot work is the battery holsters which are very important. They are designed for the Phantom 3 battery (understandably), The phantom 4 battery is much much wider and will not accommodate the new battery.
customer_reviews.author: KareemA

customer_reviews.title: If you travel with a DJI Phantom, this is absolutely the best bag to buy
customer_reviews.text: If you have a DJI Phantom and want to travel with your drone, this is the backpack to get! They thought of everything, and it is just perfect for the drone. A bit on the pricier side, but believe me, it is worth it! Top-notch quality as has been the standard for all Manfrotto products.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Easters

product_meta.title: Manfrotto MB BP-D1 DJI Professional Video Equipment Cases Drone Backpack (Black),22" x 13" x 19"
product_meta.description: The DJI Drone Backpack accommodates a DJI Phantom drone as well as a DSLR and lens plus a tripod. Perfect for on the go, this bag allows for multiple ways to carry the drone. Users can choose to place the drone in the backpack for extra protection, or can strap the drone on the outside of the bag to move quickly to another location. The Manfrotto drone bag has all of the space you need to carry a drone, drone accessories, the controller, a full sized DSLR with lens, camera accessories and more. This bag will hold the following DJI drones: DJI Phantom 1 DJI Phantom FC40 DJI Phantom 2 DJI Phantom 2 Vision DJI Phantom 2 Vision+ DJI Phantom 3 Standard DJI Phantom 3 Advanced DJI Phantom 3 Professional Technical specifications: External Dimensions: 22" x 13.4" x 9" Internal Dimensions: 21.2" x 11.8" x 6.3
feature_bullets: Plenty of space for all of your gear
Designed to fit many different configurations of DJI Phantom
